actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend the Council on Wage and Price Stability Act to extend the termination date to September 30, 1977.
short_title: Council on Wage and Price Stability Act Amendments

summary.text: Council on Wage and Price Stability Act Amendments - Stipulates that any Director of the Council on Wage and Price Stability appointed by the President after the date of enactment of this Act shall be appointed with the advice and consent of the Senate. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as are necessary for fiscal years 1976 and 1977. Extends the authority granted by the Council on Wage and Price Stability Act until September 30, 1977.

titles.title: Council on Wage and Price Stability Act Amendments
A bill to amend the Council on Wage and Price Stability Act to extend the termination date to September 30, 1977.
